error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\mollie_payment\Entity\MollieProfile::setEntityManager() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Declaration of Drupal\mollie_payment\Entity\MollieProfile\MollieProfileListBuilder::buildRow(Drupal\mollie_payment\Entity\MollieProfile $entity) should be compatible with Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityListBuilder::buildRow(Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface $entity)

Call to deprecated method getLabel() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use $entity->label() instead. This method used to escape the entity label. The render system's autoescape is now relied upon.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to mollie_payment.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.

The drupal/core requirement is not Drupal 9 compatible. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement compatible with Drupal 9.
